qas.question: In what type of molecules are oxygen found?

answers.text: almost all biomolecules that are important to (or generated by) life

qas.question: How many biomolecules contain no oxygen?
Which organic compounds contain the greatest amount of oxygen by mass?
Besides fats, fatty acids, and amino acids,what other organic compounds contain oxygen?
In what calcium containing body part is oxygen a part?
What element is found in all biomolecules?
What element do squalene and the carotenes contain?
What do carbohydrates have the most of by mass?
